title: Imperial city
creator_credit: David Rowan, Margaret Williams and Arbor Films
brief_description: In 1911, the British built a new capital for India. The creation of New Delhi was the greatest artistic enterprise of the British Empire, and we follow the architects in a search for a style incorporating British and Indian architecture.
creator_credit_for_label: David Rowan, Margaret Williams and Arbor Films
